original_text: Remember to be kind to other people. Share with them the things that you have. God is happy with sacrifices like that.
korean_text: 오직 선을 행함과 서로 나누어 주기를 잊지 말라 하나님은 이같은 제사를 기뻐하시느니라

sentences.original_text: Remember to be kind to other people.
Share with them the things that you have.
God is happy with sacrifices like that.
